description.value:
Requirements You haven't used this ability since you last Raged

You breathe deeply and exhale powerful energy in a 30-foot cone or 60-foot line, dealing [[/r (@details.level.value)d6#Dragon's Rage Breath]]{1d6 damage per level}. The area and damage type match those of your dragon (see @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Dragon Instinct]{Table 3-4}).

If you used this ability in the last hour, the area and the damage are halved (15-foot cone or 30-foot line; [[/r (floor(@details.level.value/2))d6#Dragon's Rage Breath]]{1d6 damage for every 2 levels}).

Each creature in the area must attempt a basic Reflex save.
